compose_form.direct_message_warning: This post will only be sent to the mentioned users.
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This post won't be listed under any hashtag as it is unlisted. Only public posts can be searched by hashtag.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can follow you to view your follower-only posts.

confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to block {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this status?
confirmations.delete_list.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
confirmations.domain_block.message: Are you really, really sure you want to block the entire {domain}? In most cases a few targeted blocks or mutes are sufficient and preferable. You will not see content from that domain in any public timelines or your notifications. Your followers from that domain will be removed.
confirmations.mute.message: Are you sure you want to mute {name}?
confirmations.redraft.message: Are you sure you want to delete this status and re-draft it? Favorites and boosts will be lost, and replies to the original post will be orphaned.
confirmations.reply.message: Replying now will overwrite the message you are currently composing. Are you sure you want to proceed?
confirmations.unfollow.message: Are you sure you want to unfollow {name}?
embed.instructions: Embed this status on your website by copying the code below.
embed.preview: Here is what it will look like:
emoji_button.label: Insert emoji
empty_column.blocks: You haven't blocked any users yet.
empty_column.community: The Community firehose is empty. Write something publicly to get the ball rolling!
empty_column.direct: You don't have any direct messages yet. When you send or receive one, it will show up here.
empty_column.domain_blocks: There are no hidden domains yet.
empty_column.favourited_statuses: You don't have any favorite posts yet. When you favorite one, it will show up here.
empty_column.favourites: No one has favorited this post yet. When someone does, they will show up here.
empty_column.follow_requests: You don't have any follow requests yet. When you receive one, it will show up here.
empty_column.hashtag: There is nothing in this hashtag yet.
empty_column.home: Your my friends timeline is empty! Visit {public} or use search to get started and meet other users.
empty_column.list: There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list post new statuses, they will appear here.
empty_column.lists: You don't have any lists yet. When you create one, it will show up here.
empty_column.mutes: You haven't muted any users yet.
empty_column.notifications: You don't have any notifications yet. To meet new people try 'pinning' the Community firehose as a new column!
empty_column.public: There is nothing here! Write something publicly, or manually follow users from other servers to fill it up
getting_started.heading: Getting started
getting_started.open_source_notice: Mastodon is open source software. You can contribute or report issues on GitHub at {github}.
hashtag.column_settings.tag_toggle: Include additional tags for this column
introduction.federation.federated.text: In addition to user mute and block, you can also choose to filter your feed columns based on any keywords or phrases you like.
introduction.federation.home.headline: Unique Features
introduction.federation.home.text: CounterSocial has many unique standard features that you won't find on other platforms. Some of those are highlighted above.
introduction.federation.local.headline: User Configurable
introduction.federation.local.text: As a COSONAUT you can configure your dashboard feed columns however you like, change the order, add a hashtag monitor or combo-list.
introduction.interactions.favourite.head: It's Okay, We Know...
introduction.interactions.favourite.text: ... you probably skipped through this intro, and that's okay! Hit LET ME IN NOW to dive in. Don't forget to introduce yourself with the #introductions hashtag.
introduction.interactions.reblog.text: There's' no ads or sponsored content here. We're entirely crowd-powered by our users and as such your data is shared with NOBODY.
introduction.interactions.reply.headline: PRO Features
introduction.interactions.reply.text: Core functionality is free to all, but you can upgrade your account to PRO and have access to the features highlighted above, and MORE!
introduction.welcome.headline: First steps
introduction.welcome.text: Welcome to {domain}! We probably look a little different to what you are used to in Social Media. Our primary interface is more like a dashboard, that you don't have to refresh, made up of user-configurable 'feed columns'. In a few moments, you'll be able to broadcast messages and talk to your friends around the world, and hopefully make new ones too in a secure harassment-free environment. No trolls, and no fake news.
keyboard_shortcuts.column: to focus a status in one of the columns
keyboard_shortcuts.down: to move down in the list
keyboard_shortcuts.heading: Keyboard shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.post: to start a brand new post
keyboard_shortcuts.up: to move up in the list

report.hint: The report will be sent to your server moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns statuses you have written, favorited, boosted, or have been mentioned in, as well as matching usernames, display names, and hashtags.
search_popout.tips.text: Simple text returns matching display names, usernames and hashtags
